name: places/ChIJB_MDZKv3wokRvh5LqtFxUX8
formattedAddress: 304 W 133rd St, New York, NY 10030, USA
adrFormatAddress: 304 W 133rd St, New York, NY 10030, USA

originalText.text: Thank you to HER Event Space for the space for my granddaughter’s 1st birthday party. Location is super convenient! Owner is super sweet and very accommodating. Will utilize space again.

text.text: Thank you to HER Event Space for the space for my granddaughter’s 1st birthday party. Location is super convenient! Owner is super sweet and very accommodating. Will utilize space again.

originalText.text: Place was much smaller than pictured. We were not given all items as promised as far as sturners to hold the food .  The bathroom door lock was broken so door does not lock. There was no toilet tissue, hand soap nor paper towels available in the bathroom. We had to buy everything on our own as well as have someone stand outside the bathroom so no one could go in while in use. Definitely a no for me. We made the best out of the night for my sons going away event but if I had a second chance a hard NO. Thumbs down

originalText.text: Sorry but do not book this place. they are very unprofessional. i was told to get to the place at 3 and when i got there nobody was there and when i asked she said she was going to be there at 4. another thing i was expecting for the place to be ready when i got there chairs tables and the balloon arch instead i got an empty space no chairs no tables no balloon arch. and for the balloon arch which is supposed to include the balloon stand she waits until the day of that we had to pay for the balloon arch stand when i asked before and told her that i needed a round balloon stand not the square or u shaped one and that’s ok i don’t mind paying but then she proceeded and gave me a circle arch that didn’t have the bottom part for it to actually stand i literally had to put two chairs to hold it up. Also on the contract that i signed said nothing about that we had to clean up and she said that we needed to clean up at the end and we had the place until 12 and she’s gonna come in at 10:30 and be like we need to turn the music down ? but ok that’s fine doesn’t matter and then back to the balloon arch i swear it’s not a balloon arch she literally only does like three bundles of balloons and then adds some small one. anyways moral of the story is that she scams you out of your money. i rented a better place MUCH larger on 145 and i spent less money on that one then this one and it was so much more worth the money i spent. should’ve done it there!

originalText.text:
VERY UNPROFESSIONAL.
I gave my sister a birthday party at this location because of convenience. The NIGHT before the event the owner HER called and told us that we had to change our event time from 9pm-2am to 9pm-12am. Then she showed up telling us to turn our music down..we also paid for those hours in full, she never reimbursed the money for the hours she took back from us . We also asked HER about the 360 camera machine,  paid her for that, she never produced it nor gave any money back for not producing the machine. Please  don't waste your time renting ANYTHING from Her.

originalText.text:
Terrible and Unprofessional. The owner ruined my wifes birthday, something that was very important to my Wife. I booked because it was a convient location on a short notice for a few people. Not only did she show up 2 hours late, she had a crying baby and infant child with her to an adult event. No apologizes, no concern. Our time was thrown off, had to serve our guest cold food. We was told we couldnt get those extra 2 hours back BUT for our next event we can be discounted! The people who over heard us talking were extremely confused but i said okay and left it at that not to worry my wife.
Another issue, we were told she provides add ons such as catering, decorations etc. Which was great to save energy dealing with numerous vendors. I asked her for a catering menu. She sent me a list. I ask is there any way we can do a paid tasting before hand. She said go to the local resturant around the corner and order what we want to taste. Because she get the pans from them. Which we declined, because why are you advertizing you are a caterer & have a full menu on your page and thats not your work. Seriously The owners attitude needs work. She needs accountability. Save yourself the headache and money. It seems shes only in it for money.
